models.noModelsAvailable: No models available. Please check your configuration.

inviteDialog.dialogDescription: Send an invitation to a new user to join your organization.
inviteDialog.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
inviteDialog.invitationCreatedDescription: The invitation has been created. Please send this invitation link to the user so they can join your organization.
inviteDialog.clickToCopy: Click the copy button to copy the invitation link

confirmations.deleteInviteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the invite for {{email}}? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.changeUserRoleDescription: Are you sure you want to change {{name}}'s role to {{role}}?
